title: Midterm Exams Begin
description: Midterm exams will commence on 14th June. All students must be present.

title: Parents Meeting
description: All parents are invited for the annual meeting on 21st June at the school hall.

title: School Clubs Registration
description: Club registration is open for all students. Deadline: 15th June.

title: Closing of school
description: Schools will be closed on January 17th
